property.name: Text
property.value: Resources in Na’asiyah’s resource pool cannot be used to pay for allies. Action: While Na’asiyah is attacking or defending, spend 1 resource from her resource pool to give her +2 Û or +2 Ú for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Ranger or Ì hero. Response: After a Signal attachment is attached to a hero, exhaust Rune-master to add 1 resource to that hero’s resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you declare a Noble character as a defender against an attack made by an engaged enemy, return that enemy to the staging area. Then, cancel the attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Veteran Sword-elf gains +1 Û and +1 Ú for each copy of Veteran Sword-elf in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Warrior character. Limit 1 per character. Attached character gets +2 hit points. Response: When another character would be assigned any amount of damage, place 1 of that damage on attached character instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. Each enemy engaged with that player gets –1 Ú until the end of the phase. Then, the players as a group may spend 2 Î resources to have the chosen player draw 1 card each time he attacks and destroys an enemy this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Linhir Sea-captain from your hand, if you paid all of its resource cost from a single hero’s resource pool, both that hero and Linhir Sea-captain do not exhaust to quest this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Ê hero, or to Éowyn. Restricted. Attached character gets +1 Ò. Response: After attached character is removed from the quest, exhaust Windfola to commit attached hero to the quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot attack or defend. Action: Spend 1 Î resource to exhaust Ioreth. Then, heal 3 points of damage on a character. Any player may trigger this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may exhaust any number of Healer characters you control as part of this card’s cost. Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each Healer character you exhaust in this way. Refresh Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that hero into play under its owner's control, with 1 damage token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Planning Action: Add Justice Shall Be Done to the victory display to draw 3 cards and add 3 resources to the resource pool of each hero you control. At the end of the round, you are eliminated from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Prepare the Corsair deck. Players prepare their fleet. Set each copy of Dol Amroth Warship aside, out of play. Search the encounter deck for Raider Flagship and 1 copy of Scouting Ship, and add them to the staging area. Search the encounter deck for a Dol Amroth objective of your choice and add it to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter deck and resolve the Guarded keyword on that objective.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. Forced: When a Ship enemy engages you, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), deal 2 damage to a Ship objective you control. If you are on-course (º), deal 2 damage to that Ship enemy instead. If your current heading is at the worst setting (¾), Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ship enemy and add it to the staging area (2 Ship enemies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game). Shuffle the encounter deck. For each unguarded objective in the staging area, attach a non-unique Ship enemy in the staging area to that objective, guarding it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. If your current heading is at the worst setting (¾), Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost. You cannot advance while at least 1 objective is guarded by an encounter.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The players make engagement checks against each enemy in the staging area. Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost during these engagement checks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. Raider Flagship gets –50 engagement cost. Break Through the Fleet! has +5 quest points for each Ship enemy in play. If this stage is defeated, or if Raider Flagship is in the victory display, the players have broken through the Corsair fleet and win the game!

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. If you are on-course (º), Dol Amroth Warship gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú. Forced: When Dol Amroth Warship is destroyed, set it aside, out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Only Ship objectives can be declared as attackers against Raider Flagship. Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, the engaged player reveals the top card of the Corsair deck and engages it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Response: After Corsair Skirmisher is destroyed as an enemy, the engaged player may discard allies he controls with a total of at least 3 Ò to take control of Corsair Skirmisher as a Ship-Objective with Ò equal to its $. (It loses the Ship-Enemy card type and gains the Ship-Objective card type).

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. While Siege Ship is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if Siege Ship is not guarding an objective and there is an unguarded objective in the staging area, attach Siege Ship to that objective, guarding it.”

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Dol Amroth objective and add it to the staging area. Then, attach Heavy Cruiser to that objective, guarding it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), Coast of Anfalas gets +2 $. Travel: Exhaust a Ship objective to travel here.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot travel to Belfalas Islet if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾). Response: After you travel to Belfalas Islet, choose a Ship enemy that is not guarding an objective. While Belfalas Islet is the active location, the chosen enemy is considered to be out of play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cobas Haven is the active location, reduce the Boarding X value on each Ship enemy by 1.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you are off-course, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), the engaged Ship enemy with the highest Û makes an immediate attack. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the total $ in the staging area for each damage dealt by this attack. If no attack is made as a result of this effect, Ramming Speed! gains doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to a Ship objective. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: When attached objective exhausts, deal 2 damage to it. Action: Exhaust 3 characters you control to discard Taking on Water.”)

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If defending character is a Ship, attach Taking on Water to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose a Ship enemy that is not currently guarding an objective. Attach that enemy to an unguarded objective in the staging area, guarding it (return that enemy to the staging area if it is engaged). If no Ship enemy is returned to the staging area by this effect, The Raiders’ Assault gains surge.󲂐

property.name: Text
property.value: If Sea-ward Tower is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. While the players control Sea-ward Tower, look at 2 additional cards from the top of the encounter deck during each Sailing test.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Tower of the Gull is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. Combat Action: If the players control Tower of the Gull, exhaust it to deal 2 damage to a non-unique Ship enemy. Any player may trigger this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Beacon is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. Planning Action: If the players control The Beacon, exhaust it and spend 5 resources to take control of 1 set aside copy of Dol Amroth Warship. Any player may trigger this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Tower of the Heron is free of encounters, add it to the staging area, controlled by the players. While Tower of the Heron is controlled by the players, reduce the archery total by 4.
